TITLE: Satya Nadella credits Steve Ballmer for pushing Microsoft into the cloud
SUMMARY: While Satya Nadella is celebrated for turning around Microsoft, the CEO says that his predecessor, Steve Ballmer, encouraged the early moves to the cloud.

TITLE: Sheryl Sandberg says Facebook wants to help small businesses pay workers and move online amid COVID-19 crisis
SUMMARY: Sandberg said on Tuesday that Facebook will do what it can to help its employees and small businesses manage through the coronavirus outbreak.

TITLE: Tesla could help make lithium ion batteries for ventilators to help fight COVID-19, says ResMed CEO Mick Farrell
SUMMARY: Amid a COVID-19 pandemic and ventilator shortage, Tesla purchased 1,000 "non-invasive ventilators" made by ResMed to donate to hospitals, explained CEO Mick Farrell. Typically, higher-end ventilators are recommended to treat patients.

TITLE: Facebook is giving $20 million to women, minority and veteran-owned businesses, says Sheryl Sandberg
SUMMARY: Facebook COO Sheryl Sandberg on Wednesday said the company is giving $20 million to small businesses owned by women, minorities and veterans in the U.S.

TITLE: 'Real men wear masks': Nancy Pelosi urges caution as the economy reopens
SUMMARY: Pelosi again pushed for the Senate to pass a bill to offer more relief to state and local governments during the coronavirus pandemic.
